name: interruptAfter
signature: { (duration: DurationInput): <A, E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => Stream<A, E, R>; <A, E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, duration: DurationInput): Stream<A, E, R>; }
description:
Specialized version of `Stream.interruptWhen` which interrupts the
evaluation of this stream after the given `Duration`.
documentation:
Specialized version of `Stream.interruptWhen` which interrupts the
evaluation of this stream after the given `Duration`.
